regen.new_specification: Allow users to name the document in the special GUI before saving to ensure proper identification and retrieval in future.
When saving a document, the system shall allow users to name the document before it is stored, ensuring the name is recorded alongside its Entity connections for future retrieval.
The GUI shall provide an option for the user to name the document before it is saved with its Entity connections.

label: The user may optionally specify a descriptive name for the document.
